title: Boteler's case being an impartial narrative of the tryal, & penitent behaviour of Master UUilliam Boteler, executed September 10th at Chelmsford, about the murder of Capt. Wade : with the substance of a sermon preached on that occasion, and his last speech faithfully taken.
author: Boteler, William, d. 1678.
publisher: Printed for J. Clarke, and P. Brooksby,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
